parameters.name: AutoProvisioningGroupId
parameters.description: The ID of the auto provisioning group. You can specify up to 20 IDs.

parameters.name: AutoProvisioningGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the auto provisioning group.

parameters.name: AutoProvisioningGroupStatus
parameters.description: The status of the auto provisioning group.

parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description:
The page number.

Pages start from page 1.

Default value: 1.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description:
The number of entries per page.

Valid values: 1 to 100.

Default value: 10.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The region ID of the auto provisioning group.

parameters.name: ResourceGroupId
parameters.description: The ID of the resource group to which the auto provisioning group belongs.

parameters.name: Tag
parameters.description: The tags that are added to the auto provisioning group.
